title: Christmas Is Good: Trixie's Guide to a Happy Holiday
description: A best-selling author's dog offers her advice on the yuletide season, from gift giving (hot dogs are always welcome) to baking tasty sausage-peanut butter Christmas biscuits to making a dog fluffier for all the holiday parties, in a book with full-color photos. 100,000 first printing.
author: Trixie Koontz
